attributes.action: Give paedophiles either imprisonment or institutionalised for the whole sentence
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I hereby state that all paedophiles should be given a sentence in prison, of which they must stay for the duration. No early release for good behaviour, or bail. Or if they are in an unfit mental state, given a sentence of which they must spend in an insitute, again not being released until the full sentence has been served.
